title: STING OPERATION CAUGHT THREE SRILANKAN UMPIRES INVOLVED IN MATCH FIXING
content: Onlanka News – by Walter Jaywardhana The Times of India in a lead story revealed  that several umpires,three from Sri Lanka, were allegedly involved in match fixing. The three involved in Sri Lanka were named as Gamini Dissanayaka, Maurice Winston,and Sagara Gallage….
